body.name: Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut, High Performance Thermal Paste for Cooling All Processors, Graphics Cards and Heat Sinks in Computers and Consoles -1.0 Gram
body.stockDetail: Only 10 left in stock - order soon.
features: 12.5W/(m·K) THERMAL CONDUCTIVITY - Very high conductivity, perfect for even demanding configurations.
EASY TO USE - A specially constructed spatula for spreading thermal grease is included.
LONG ACTION - Kryonaut thermal paste's unique structure allows for long-lasting effectiveness, even at temperatures up to 80 degrees Celsius without drying out.
OUTSTANDING RESULTS - Using this thermal solution can immediately lower temperatures, reducing equipment noise and improving user comfort.
TOP PERFORMING - Confirmed by multiple tests, the preferred option satisfies the highest quality criteria for both standard computer users and enthusiastic overclocking fans.
1 GRAM - useable for up to 6 CPUs (depending on diy size)
body.description: About Kryonaut thermal grease Kryonaut thermal grease is specifically designed to meet the rigorous demands of the overclocking community and is highly regarded as a top-performing product for critical cooling systems in industrial settings. Technical details Thermal Conductivity: 12.5 W/mkThermal Resistance: 0,0032 K/WElectrical Conductivity: 0 pS/mViscosity: 120-170 PasSpecificWeight: 3,7g/cm3Temperature: -250 °C / +350 °CCapacity: 1g | 1,5ml/5,55g | 3ml/11,1g | 10ml/37g

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Kryonaut thermal grease Kryonaut thermal grease is specifically designed to meet the rigorous demands of the overclocking community and is highly regarded as a top-performing product for critical cooling systems in industrial settings. Technical details Thermal Conductivity: 12.5 W/mkThermal Resistance: 0,0032 K/WElectrical Conductivity: 0 pS/mViscosity: 120-170 PasSpecificWeight: 3,7g/cm3Temperature: -250 °C / +350 °CCapacity: 1g | 1,5ml/5,55g | 3ml/11,1g | 10ml/37g Characteristics designed for Overclocking excellent thermal conductivity long-lasting durability no curing no electrical conductivity

Structure is the secret Kryonaut employs a unique structure that prevents drying out at high temperatures of up to 80°C. This design also incorporates nano-aluminum and zinc-oxide particles to enhance thermal conductivity and compensate for any irregularities in the CPU or heat sink, resulting in exceptional heat transfer.

Great compatibility Compatible with almost all cooling solutions, including air, water, and even liquid nitrogen (up to -250°C). Compatibilities PS3, PS4, PS5 Xbox 360, One, Series S, Series X CPU, GPU, LEDs Heat dissipation fins and fans Laptops, Macbooks

For the true "Kryonauts" amongst the "extreme overclockers" The term "Kryo," derived from the Greek word for "cold," is also used in the German word for "cryoengineering." This implies that the thermal grease may have been specifically designed for use in cryogenic applications.

Scope of delivery Kryonaut thermal grease A syringe of Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut containing 1 gram of thermal grease. Spatula A spatula specifically designed to evenly spread the grease. Check if it is original You can verify the authenticity of the thermal grease by entering the code on the website. Bag and manual An airtight sealable and reusable package to prevent drying out. The package also contains instructions on how to apply the thermal grease correctly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this to replace the thermal paste on my 2016 HP Spectre x360 15 since it was running hot often and the fan would almost constantly be on. Thermal paste came in a syringe style container so it was super easy to apply. I'm not super computer oriented, but I do like to tinker and fix my own things. Months later my computer is running cool and the fan only really comes on if its charging and the battery gets warm. Before my laptop would reach upwards of 145F and now it usually runs around 105F. Definitely recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easily Spreadable and High Thermal Conductivity
reviews.reviewText: Spread easily on my CPU and makes a good conductor to my cooler. Very easy to use and highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely Cool! 24 C idle temp, 70 c max load
reviews.reviewText: I'm very impressed by this thermal grease. It keeps my CPU nearly frozen. At idle, it runs at 24 C. With a stress test, it was in the 70's. I do not have to worry about the temps being in the 80's or 90's with this compound.The application was very simple even for a first timer like myself. It's very easy to push the paste out in the pattern you want. I went with the X pattern myself. The only issue is that it ran out of paste when I was finishing off the X pattern. There's only enough paste for one use so you gotta be sure of how you want to use this.Overall it's very good paste! The results deliver for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You can get more elsewhere but this is a superior product
reviews.reviewText: Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut The High Performance Thermal Paste is a game-changer when it comes to thermal management for electronic components. Here's my in-depth review:The Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut thermal paste lives up to its reputation of being high-performance. It provides exceptional heat transfer capabilities, effectively reducing temperatures and improving overall thermal efficiency. Whether you're overclocking your CPU or GPU, or simply seeking optimal cooling for your system, this thermal paste delivers impressive results.The application process is smooth and hassle-free. The included applicator makes it easy to apply the paste precisely without any mess. The paste spreads evenly, ensuring excellent contact between the heat source and the cooling solution.One notable advantage of Kryonaut is its longevity. It maintains its effectiveness over time, retaining its thermal conductivity without drying out or deteriorating. This is particularly valuable for those who prefer not to frequently reapply thermal paste.The thermal paste's non-conductive properties provide peace of mind when working with delicate components. It eliminates the risk of accidental short-circuits, allowing for worry-free installation and peace of mind.Although the price may be slightly higher compared to other thermal pastes on the market, the exceptional thermal performance and reliability justify the investment. The results speak for themselves, as Kryonaut helps maximize the potential of your cooling solution and ensures optimal performance under demanding conditions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommended, durability is one of the best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This got here fast on time ...
reviews.reviewText: This worked great, I love how they added the spatula. I read this is great thermal paste for high Temps so here I am . Laptop runs better with new thermal paste, guess old one was bad .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's thermal paste and it works. Arrived on time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Product. 1 year strong and still like 1st application
reviews.reviewText: I bought this paste for 3 different devices: an Asus G20CB desktop, an HP Pavilion desktop, and a 2021 Asus G14 laptop. After verifying that the paste was authentic, application was pretty straightforward and easy since it came with 2 different nib/spatula tips for the syringe of pate.I basically run stock after removing the bloat, no overclocks or anything, but I still wanted to repaste due to improvements to temps. Because of that the 2 desktops didn't see much difference, 3–6-degree Celsius give or take for the CPUs and GPUs. And even now, it is still holding the same temps as it did underload as it did when I 1st repasted it.My G14 however did see a sizeable improvement from what it originally had; CPU saw a 13 degree drop and GPU saw a 5-degree drop. I can't really say if it was because the factory liquid metal application was botched or just old, but this paste does well enough to keep the CPU from going past 85 degrees since before repasting my highs would sometimes reach 100 degrees and prevents my fans from turning into jet engines. It did last a good 13 months before temps are starting to slowly climb, so I will need to repaste soon. Will probably try Hyronaught this time since others reportedly say that it is better for laptop use due to higher idle and heavy load temps.Overall, it is an excellent product (if authentic, BEWARE OF FAKES). Yes, it is expensive, but the performance results do speak for itself and the reputation that it gained as a go-to by known overclockers is warranted; but it is ultimately up to you how much you value that improvement and if it is worth the price. For me however, despite not being an overclocker, it was worth every penny since lowering those operation and idle temps is just another way to have my last longer.
Es de las mejores pastas térmicas en el mercado, la verdad estoy satisfecho con los resultados que me da
Produto de alta qualidade, entrega rapida antes do prazo e bem embalada.

As an avid PC enthusiast, I understand the importance of maintaining optimal temperatures for peak performance. Recently, I decided to try the Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut High-Performance Thermal Paste, and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed with the results. In this review, I will share my experience with this thermal paste, focusing on its performance, ease of application, and overall effectiveness.Performance:Thermal Grizzly's Kryonaut lives up to its reputation as a high-performance thermal paste. It boasts exceptional thermal conductivity, allowing it to efficiently transfer heat away from the CPU or GPU to the heatsink. During my tests, I noticed a tangible reduction in temperature, particularly under heavy loads and during prolonged gaming sessions. The improved thermal conductivity contributed to more stable system performance and mitigated any potential throttling issues, ensuring my PC operated at its best.Ease of Application:One standout feature of the Kryonaut thermal paste is its ease of application. The syringe packaging and included spreader tool made the process simple and mess-free. The paste's consistency is ideal, allowing for precise and uniform spreading across the processor's surface. Its non-conductive nature provides added peace of mind, as there is no risk of short-circuits should any paste accidentally come into contact with surrounding components.Longevity and Durability:Thermal Grizzly's Kryonaut is known for its long-lasting effectiveness. After several months of use, I found that the paste maintained its thermal properties without any noticeable degradation. This durability ensures that the thermal paste will continue to provide reliable heat dissipation over an extended period, eliminating the need for frequent reapplication.Versatility:The Kryonaut thermal paste is suitable for a wide range of applications, including CPUs, GPUs, and even other components requiring thermal interface material. Its versatility makes it an excellent choice for various PC building and upgrading projects. Whether you're a casual user or an overclocking enthusiast, this thermal paste caters to diverse needs.Value for Money:While the Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut may be priced slightly higher than some other thermal pastes on the market, its exceptional performance, ease of application, and long-lasting effectiveness justify the investment. The improved cooling capabilities translate to better overall system stability and longevity, making it a worthwhile upgrade for any PC enthusiast seeking peak performance.Final Thoughts:In conclusion, the Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut High-Performance Thermal Paste has exceeded my expectations. Its outstanding thermal conductivity, ease of application, durability, and versatility make it an excellent choice for anyone aiming to optimize their PC's cooling potential. If you're looking to achieve lower temperatures, improved system performance, and a reliable thermal solution, the Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut is undoubtedly worth considering.Disclaimer: I purchased the Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut High-Performance Thermal Paste independently and did not receive it as part of any specific program or incentive. My review is solely based on my personal experience and observations with this thermal paste.

reviews.reviewTitle: La pasta termica di altissima qualità
reviews.reviewText: Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut è una pasta termica a base di metallo liquido che offre prestazioni termiche eccezionali. È stata progettata per le applicazioni più impegnative, come l'overclocking estremo e l'uso in ambienti industriali.Prestazioni termicheKryonaut ha una conduttività termica di 12,5 W/mK, che è la più alta tra le paste termiche disponibili sul mercato. Questo significa che è in grado di trasferire il calore dal processore o dalla scheda grafica al dissipatore in modo molto efficiente.In test comparativi, Kryonaut ha dimostrato di poter ridurre le temperature del processore fino a 10 gradi Celsius rispetto ad altre paste termiche. Questo può portare a un aumento delle prestazioni e a una maggiore durata del componente.Facile da applicareKryonaut è facile da applicare. Basta utilizzare una piccola quantità e distribuirla uniformemente sulla superficie del processore o della scheda grafica. La pasta è molto viscosa e non si secca, quindi non è necessario applicarla di nuovo frequentemente.Stabilità nel tempoKryonaut è molto stabile nel tempo e mantiene le sue prestazioni per molti anni. Questo la rende una scelta ideale per i sistemi che devono essere utilizzati per lunghi periodi di tempo.ControIl prezzo di Kryonaut è leggermente superiore a quello di altre paste termiche. Tuttavia, le sue prestazioni eccezionali la rendono un'ottima scelta per gli utenti che cercano il massimo delle prestazioni.VerdettoThermal Grizzly Kryonaut è la pasta termica di altissima qualità disponibile sul mercato. Offre prestazioni termiche eccezionali, è facile da applicare e stabile nel tempo. È la scelta ideale per gli utenti che cercano il massimo delle prestazioni per il loro sistema.ProPrestazioni termiche eccezionaliFacile da applicareStabile nel tempoControPrezzo leggermente alto

Die zauberpaste hat meinen Laptop um 30°C runter gekühlt.Vor dem erneuern der Paste belief sich die temperatur beim Zocken auf knapp unter 90 mit Kühlmatte.Jetzt unter Volllast bin ich nicht über 64°C gekommen. Einfach der Hammer.Leicht aufzutragen und der gesamte Wechsel hat vielleicht 15 min gedauert
